skills.title: Front-End Development
skills.desc: Developing in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript using industry-standard and up-and-coming technologies, while writing clean, well-documented code and adhering to strict coding standards

skills.title: Responsive Design
skills.desc: Building interfaces with graceful degradation for all major browsers, devices, and operating systems

skills.title: QA Resolution
skills.desc: Identifying, cataloging, and fixing bugs in all major environments

skills.title: Accessibility Compliance
skills.desc: Following ADA and Section 508 compliance standards for markup, contrast, and interaction

skills.title: User Experience
skills.desc: Creating ambitious new experiences while maintaining tried-and-true usability principles

skills.title: Teaching
skills.desc: Educating clients, peers, and students about best development practices
